mapper.select: select sender.id as sendUserId, sender.username as sendUsername, sender.nickname as sendNickname from friend_request fr left join users sender on fr.from_id = sender.id where fr.to_id = #{acceptUserId}
select u.id as friendUserId, u.username as friendUsername, u.nickname as friendNickname from friend_list mf left join users u on u.id = mf.friend_id where mf.owner_id = #{userId}
